edu.cmu.sei.arche.corebridge.interactions
Class LifeCycleInteractions

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.sei.arche.corebridge.interactions.Interactions
      edu.cmu.sei.arche.corebridge.interactions.LifeCycleInteractions
public class LifeCycleInteractions
extends Interactions

To undertake all life cycle mangement interactions with the ArchE Core related to a project being loaded (opened), saved, closed (and saved by default) and check pointed (equivalent to a binary save of the entire fact base in the Core) in the user interface.

Author:
Neel Mullick

Method Detail

startupRete

public jess.Rete startupRete(java.lang.String fileProject,
                             IRefreshableUI ui,
                             ProjectVO project,
                             java.util.List designElementTypes,
                             java.util.List designRelationTypes)
                      throws ArchEException
Initializes the Rete object and batch loads the project related file. Also add the listener that listens for events in the ArchE Core of type = JessEvent.FACT

Parameters:
fileProject - Complete filename of the project persisted fact base file to be batch loaded / executed
ui - represents the UI layer that is currently displaying the data of the factbase that will accessed by this facade instance. The reference to the UI is needed further ahead by the VO objects so that they know what UI to call to flag views to refresh.
project - The ProjectVO object is the entry point to access all the facts in memory.
designElementTypes - List of design element type definitions
designRelationTypes - List of design relation type definitions
Returns:
engineArchE The Rete object that will be maintained locally by the ArchEFacade and used by other interactions with the ArchE Core.
Throws:
ArchEException - in case it's not possible to initialize Jess

shutdownRete

public void shutdownRete(jess.Rete engineArchE,
                         java.lang.String fileProject,
                         int shutDownStatus)
Shuts down the Rete object and saves the persistent facts to the specified file.

Parameters:
engineArchE - The centrally located Rete object using which the fact is asserted.
fileProject - Filename with filename of the project persisted fact base file.
shutDownStatus - The integer value which is used to tell Life Cycle interactions the mode to shut down the Core in. 0 will shut down the core after saving the persistent fact base. 1 will save the persistent fact base and not shut down the Core. 2 will shut down the core without saving the persistent fact base.
